article_title: Stop whatever you’re doing and watch this: The Rock lip-syncing Taylor Swift is absolutely incredible
article_text:
Topics: Dwayne Johnson, Entertainment, Music, Taylor Swift, the rock, Video, Entertainment News

Spike’s “Lip Sync Battle” — an extended version of the popular “Tonight Show” segment — debuted Thursday night, and viewers discovered yet another one of Dwayne Johnson’s secret talents: impassioned T-Swift lip syncing.

The Rock kicked off the series with a ferocious treatment of the popular haters anthem, “Shake it Off” which featured the revved-up actor giving his opponent, Jimmy Fallon, the bird. LL Cool J’s stunned expression says everything you need to know.

Watch the clip below:

article_metadata.description: Dwayne Johnson brought a whole lot of passion to his lip-synced performance of "Shake it Off" last night   VIDEO
article_metadata.author: Colin Gorenstein
